tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Great professor. Exams aren\'t too difficult if you know the homework, but every now and then he\'ll throw a tough one on there to get ya, especially on the final.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Lectures and examples problems in class get you through everything. His accent is a little heavy but still easy to understand and explains everything well, always makes jokes. Quizes every other week but theyre easy and keep you up on the material. He actually makes it fairly easy to learn compared to other teachers, would totally have him again.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  TOUGH GRADER  CARING
comments: Overall good professor who seems to care about his students. Bi-weekly quizzes, while a pain, keep the student on their toes.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  HILARIOUS
comments: Great professor. Very fair and truly wants students to learn a lot and receive a good grade in the class. Exams are open text book and comparable to the HW problems, sometimes the same. Not sure why all the other bad ratings, one of the better professors I\'ve had

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: His accent is awful. He is hard to understand and our classroom was not conducive to his lecture style. He does try to help his students and is pretty humorous in class.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: The grading criteria was continuously changing in this course. The professor is difficult to understand. He has an unreasonable expectation to have an assignment due at the beginning of every class. Also, the syllabus stated one project, but our class was given two. I would recommend taking Cobourn or Brehob.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: If you miss 3 classes you get 5% off your final grade, the final exam was worth 55% of our final grade, and he gets irritated if people don\'t answer his in-class questions. Just a few of the many reasons to avoid this professor.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Not a bad class, the student-teaching part wasn\'t super, but the bulk of the class that he taught was very good.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)
comments: English isn\'t his first language, but he is a good teacher, and has a good selection of content.

comments: Hard to understand, but if you can understand him, he is a very good professor. Good sense of humor.
